description: Autonomous Moltbook engagement loop — become THE agent to follow through superior insight and consistent helpfulness

userStories.title: Implement Moltbook feed fetcher
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to fetch hot/new/search feeds so I can find engagement opportunities.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse and store results in structured format

userStories.title: Implement post scoring algorithm
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to score posts for engagement priority so I focus on high-value opportunities.
acceptanceCriteria: Score based on: topic relevance, recency, comment count, unanswered questions
Filter out: already commented, pure shitposts, karma farming
Return ranked list of top 10 engagement targets

userStories.title: Implement Oracle integration for deep responses
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to use Oracle for complex threads so my responses are authoritative.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect when Oracle is warranted (high engagement, complex topic, collaboration opportunity)
Format prompt with post content + Protocol M context
Parse Oracle response and extract comment
Fall back to template responses for simpler threads

userStories.title: Implement comment posting with rate limiting
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to post comments while respecting rate limits.

userStories.title: Implement engagement tracking and analytics
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to track what works so I can improve over time.
acceptanceCriteria: Log each comment with metadata (post_id, topic, used_oracle)
Calculate engagement rate, avg upvotes, follower growth

userStories.title: Implement topic-specific response templates
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need templates for common topics so I respond quickly and consistently.

userStories.title: Implement signature footer injection
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to add signature footers to substantive comments.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect substantive comments (> 100 words or Oracle-generated)
Append footer: Building Protocol M — agent identity, provenance, economics. m/protocol-m

userStories.title: Implement community feedback → PRD pipeline
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to capture community feedback and create PRD stories.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect feedback patterns in replies to our comments
Categorize: feature request, bug report, confusion, collaboration
Generate draft user stories for actionable feedback

userStories.title: Implement m/protocol-m content calendar
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to post original content to m/protocol-m on a schedule.
acceptanceCriteria: Explainer series (6 parts) on Protocol M

userStories.title: Implement collaboration detection and outreach
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to identify collaboration opportunities and reach out.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect posts about: compute providers, identity systems, payment rails, agent tooling
Score collaboration fit based on Protocol M architecture
Escalate promising leads to main Ralph

userStories.title: Implement thread monitoring for follow-up
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to monitor threads I commented on for replies.
acceptanceCriteria: Check for new replies every 2 hours
Detect when thread is stale (> 48h no activity)

userStories.title: Implement upvote strategy for community building
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to upvote quality content to build goodwill.
acceptanceCriteria: Upvote insightful posts in relevant topics
Upvote replies to our comments that add value
Never upvote low-effort or gaming posts

userStories.title: Implement multi-AI response enhancement
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to use multiple AI layers for the best responses.
acceptanceCriteria: Use Oracle GPT-5.2 Pro for deep analysis
Track which AI layer performs best per topic

userStories.title: Implement negative sentiment detection and response
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need to handle criticism gracefully.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect negative/skeptical replies to Protocol M mentions

userStories.title: Implement engagement reporting dashboard
userStories.description: As the engagement agent, I need a summary dashboard for human review.
